fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 shed 26.45 points or 0.13% to settle at 19,570.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2% to 11.33. Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
